title: Track an International Shipment
description: A manager needs to track the status of a critical international shipment from a supplier in Asia.

tasks.description: Identify the purchase order and get the container number or bill of lading.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the necessary tracking information.

tasks.description: Track the ocean freight to see the vessel's location and estimated arrival at port.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the vessel is scheduled to arrive at the port in 3 days.

tasks.description: Check the status of the customs clearance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that all customs paperwork has been pre-filed and is in good order.
